title: them by section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers 
(Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and Youth) Order
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister child equality disability integration youth) order

title: them by section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of
them by section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of
heading: 2. Tom Sheppard, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Tom Sheppard, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and 
Youth, is appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Minister for Children, 
Equality, Disability, Integration and Youth with effect from 15 October 2020.
text_norm: 2 tom sheppard particular whose address deposited office department child equality disability integration youth appointed special adviser minister child equality disability integration youth effect 15 october 2020

title: them by section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of
heading: 3. Eoin Wilson, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
3. Eoin Wilson, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and 
Youth, is appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Minister for Children, 
Equality, Disability, Integration and Youth with effect from 15 October 2020. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

17 November, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 20th November, 2020.
